website_summaries.verdict: A long-lasting and comfortable high ankle boot for good support and good wear.
pros: 8 inches from arch rises for good ankle protection
Works well in wet conditions and keeps feet warm
Long-lasting and comfortable enough to work all day
cons: Try ordering a half-size bigger than normal for a good fit

customer_reviews.title: Disappointing
customer_reviews.text: These boots are a big disappointment. I was really hoping for a nice pair of winter work boots. The first issue is the sole is quite hard, it gets even harder in the cold. This makes them very uncomfortable and slippery as there is no give. The other problem I have with them is that they are not warm at all. It says 400 grams which is what the last pair of boots I had was, my feet are freezing. I am not a fan of these and feel like I wanted a lot of money on boots that definitely do not do what I was hoping they would.
customer_reviews.author: Hayley

customer_reviews.title: Nothing more than average.
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed. Have been wearing the Carharrt PAC 10 inch boots and love them. Bought these based on my current and previous experience with Carharrt. The foot bed in these, are hard like cheap boots. Only padding is what you add. The original inner soles aren't the greatest. No loop at the back to make putting them on easier. The shoe lace grabber and D-day rings that are on other Carharrt boots (and many cheaper brands) are not present on this version. Initial impression and after a few days of wearing them, I can find nothing to really justify Rhett highest price, other than a brand label.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce A.

customer_reviews.title: Toasty in negative below
customer_reviews.text: Definitely keeps my feet warm, even in negative degree weather. Feet sweat but still stay toasty. Have worked multiple days in wet snow and they'll be wet by day 2 but I dont think I've owned a work book that doesn't get wet eventually (besides Muck Boots). I wouldn't hesitate to pick up a second pair
customer_reviews.author: Beau

customer_reviews.title: good traction.
customer_reviews.text: the sole becomes hard under low temp and that's means hard.the insole is not enough to absorbs the hardness of the outsole. insolation 400 grams feels 200 grams. good traction.
customer_reviews.author: raul vivas

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: I haven't had them long but the construction looks good. They are light and fairly flexible. I went up half a size because I wasn't sure of the fit. It's a good thing I did. They fit perfectly. Hopefully they hold up well. Well here I am 6 months later and the boots are done. They started coming apart. I am hard on shoes but I was getting 18 months out of Cat boots. Redwings lasting that long as well. I'm afraid you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable. ...
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable! These are a great pair of boots - I typically wear Timberland Pitbosses, Irish Setters, Danners and some others, however, I am impressed with the fit and comfort of these Carhartts - just as good as the aforementioned boots. Nice features too - insulated, waterproof, soles have good grip and overall, they look pretty good. As for a sizing reference, I wear 10.5D in sneakers (Nike, UA, NB, Asics - sneakers typically run small) and a 10D when boots fit as expected. ... and these do. A perfect secure fit while still having some wiggle room thanks to a larger toe box. All in all, a solid boot that is very comfortable. Thumbs up!
customer_reviews.author: JohnG

customer_reviews.title: I just ordered the same size that my other work boots are and they came through fine. The only thing is they are a little ...
customer_reviews.text: Wasn't sure how to size them. I just ordered the same size that my other work boots are and they came through fine. The only thing is they are a little bit wide at the front, which I am getting used to. Only had them for about 3 weeks and they are holding up great. Oh yeah, get some other laces for these, they are way too thin. I do really like how they cradle the heal though.
customer_reviews.author: James

customer_reviews.title: 6th pair..Work greatr
customer_reviews.text: I'm a mechanic and an outdoors man. I'm working inside and outside everyday. I'm also 6' 5 and 315. I'm hard on shoes. My feet are worn out from working 40 years. These boots are dry. comfy and warm in our Virginia winters. I usually wear out the boots in 8 months, but that's not Carhartt's fault. I wear theses all the time from October to April. They are that comfortable and they keep my feet and ankles supported so they hurt less. Great boots. Carhartt please keep them in production as there is nothing else like them ( I've looked plenty)
customer_reviews.author: Jean Allen

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Boots!
customer_reviews.text: I work in a refrigerated warehouse (35°) and these are the perfect boots. Just bought my second pair, the first lasting about 4 years. Composite toe, insulated, oil resistant, slip resistant, self cleaning lugs, waterproof, carhartt tough, these are the best boots around for the price. The grip could be better, but it's a fair tradeoff. These don't take very long to break in and I honestly find these more comfortable than my Nike running shoes. Looking for an honest cold weather that works as hard as you do without beating up your wallet? Look no further.
customer_reviews.author: Clint Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Perfect boots for winter/ wet conditions
customer_reviews.text: Dry warm feet super comfy get the wide sizes. Best dam boots.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Valenzuela

customer_reviews.title: Amazing will definitely buy again
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my husband, we have had a hard time finding boots that can stand up to all the walking he does, he has not stopped raving about how awesome they are! Whether he’s going up ladders or digging in the mud his feet are completely dry and very warm, however he says he will only be able to wear them in the winter they will be Way too warm for the summer hopefully they will come out with a less insulated boots! Will definitely buy again!
customer_reviews.author: April Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Rock hard sole, heavy and hot! Disappointed!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my boyfriend who is a diesel mechanic, his other shoes were falling apart so I bought him these after extensive research on quality breathable lightweight boots .... within one day of wear his feet broke out into a rash only on the top of his foot, he said they were so hot and tight that his feet were sweating and constricted! I was so bumbed. It's been a few months now and he has tried multiple times to break them in and he says they're heavy, hot and uncomfortable! They might be good looking boots, but for working in them.. I guess they're not up to the hype!
customer_reviews.author: CA

customer_reviews.title: Good deal for the price
customer_reviews.text: They fit just as they should seem to be well made for sure not one complained there! Only thing I noticed and could just be me the first 3 days wearing them at work they were great. But the 4th day started to hurt my feet after standing for 8hrs I put some inserts in and that help the next day. But after that it got bad again so I switch back to my old boots for 2 days then switch back and they were good to go again. So if you have to stand for 8+hrs a day you may want to rotate every other day so the boots can decompress and stay comfy.
customer_reviews.author: ole skool vp

customer_reviews.title: They feel and look great.
customer_reviews.text: I've been wearing size 13 work boots since 1982. First impression of these is very good. I'm old and I can tell in the first 30 seconds if I like something or not. I like how the top of the boots are small enough for me to slide my Wrangler Jean legs over. Years ago I paid the same money for made in USA boots. These are made in China like most every other footwear, but our engineers have made great strides with tooling, machines and training the makers on producing a quality product. I won't be wearing them 12 hours a day as in the past but my overall opinion is that this is a quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley Jay

customer_reviews.title: Very good insulation, no break-in troubles
customer_reviews.text: These boots are awesome. I bought them right before a trip for work. I wore them 9 days straight starting the day after I got them and not a single blister or chafe. The insulation is very good. I was standing outside in -35 C (-31 F) degree temperatures and my feet weren't cold at all and all I was wearing was a single pair of thick wool socks inside the boots. The laces are a little long for me but my feet and ankles are narrow and it beats the laces being too short and you can always cut them to your preferred length.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Arno

customer_reviews.title: They’re okay
customer_reviews.text: They were good when they were new. I’ve had them for about 7 months now. I work at a mine and I’m nearing time to buy new boots. Although these were decent, I feel that they should last longer and they have a few significant short comings. First thing I noticed was the steel toe would smash the sides of my feet. Then after a little bit of wear, the waterproofing went out the window. Laces tore in like 3 months (not that big of a deal) and they just all around seem lower quality than they should be for $150. They get the job done, and I’m not mad I bought them, but I’m not buying them again.
customer_reviews.author: beef testosterone

customer_reviews.title: Warm, comfortable, well made
customer_reviews.text: Great right out of the box. Definitely didnt have that dreaded "break in period". Couple of hours tops, and they feel fantastic. The wides are an actual wide, Love it. The composite toe makes for a nice lightweight that also doesnt feel as cold as a traditional steel toe. 27 degrees out earlier, feet felt plenty warm. Will update on the warmth and water resistance after some real winter conditions soon. I have no doubt on them being fine down into single digits, and tromping around in mud and snow, but we'll see soon enough.
customer_reviews.author: Review

customer_reviews.title: Buy them, no disappointments
customer_reviews.text: I am a commercial flat roofer and today was my first day back to work after Christmas. I beat the crap out of these boots today and they took it like a champ. I was on my feet for 12.5 hours today and you can bet I'm tired but the boots were comfortable and I don't feel the fatigue. The sole is solid and hadon't a nice grip on the ice and light snow.
customer_reviews.author: William Garnant

customer_reviews.title: Very uncofortable at first but very comfortable once broken in.
customer_reviews.text: I love these boots. However for the 1st month of wearing it daily for my construction job, it left all the welts people described. Once they're broken in, it is very comfortable. My calves were bruised for weeks but once it broke in, everything was "Gucci". They do repel water very well since I've been working in very muddy areas of New England. They are also very warm. I chose this pair of boots because they are very warm and I can wear really thin socks all year long.
customer_reviews.author: Jack Nguyen

customer_reviews.title: Work Boots
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears these every day as a contractor. He has two pairs and has ones for the workweek and the other for weekends. He likes these, but he used to wear regular wide and a size 7 1/2, but with any boot, we find he now requires a size 8 and wide width.
customer_reviews.author: mom2002

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the modest price
customer_reviews.text: Was able to wear all day at work right out of the box. Laces sucked, but I swap them out anyway on virtually all my boots with Kevlar spearfishing line. Would love if the came in black and were a little taller. All in all great little workboots well worth the$$
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: Fits exactly as expected. I work in industrial construction as an electrician, and these are great boots. Only had them about a week, but so far so good. They are very comfortable all day long, but you will break them in the first couple of days; after that, these boots are comfortable. These provide excellent ankle support, and good grip for the tread. If I could go back, I wouldn't hesitate to buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: Kamron Woods

customer_reviews.title: Great boot so far!
customer_reviews.text: Boots are great so far. I haven't had them long. Kind of stiff at first, as expected. One foot seems tighter than the other, but it may just be me. So far no water has leaked through. Worth it for the price!
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Durable and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: My favorite boot. So much so I bought 2 pairs. Warm,comfortable,and durable.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Glass

customer_reviews.title: Good boots
customer_reviews.text: LOve these boots. This is my third pair. First for the insulated. They last about a year before completely falling apart. I wear every day for 12-15 hours landscaping and wrenching. Most boots don’t hold up that long for me. Deffenitly a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: moondog

customer_reviews.title: Great boots
customer_reviews.text: Bought these for my husband as a Christmas gift since he needed new boots for work. He's a tanker and tends to be a bit rough on his work gear. He said they were right but that's to be expected with new boots. So far they've held up great but he's only had them a week.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last 7 months.
customer_reviews.text: Even tho I was happy with the boots. Insulated composite toe and rugged , not even 7 months of use ( I work at a scrapyard so I am pretty rough on boots ) both toes are split multiple spots and rubber pulled off and yesterday the whole side of my foot blew out. So I would recommend if you replace your boots every 6 months but my redwings last at leas 15-16 months
customer_reviews.author: Danielle R.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boots, my husband loved them right out if the box! Keep his feet warm and dry while working outside and while hunting. These boots have held up a heck of a lot better than some of the more expensive boots out there (yes we know from actual experience). When it's time to get a new pair of boots we will definitely be re-ordering these!
customer_reviews.author: Kieley Sue

customer_reviews.title: Nice Boot For The Money!
customer_reviews.text: Exact Fit As Labeled- 12W-Put them to the test first week of use- Logging/Sawmilling/Farming-Past the test and still Intact! Waterproof -warm and Nice Overall fit. Hopefully they last for a year- Will Update.
customer_reviews.author: E-Nick

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable and not too heavy
customer_reviews.text: I normally tear through work boots pretty quick, most boots last me 1 year or less (normally 6 months). These bad boys are about to hit 2 years with minimal wear and minor heal damage. When they do finally go I will get them again.
customer_reviews.author: Neil

customer_reviews.title: Boot is poorly made!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these boots, Based on the quality and reputation of carhartt. Boots seamed well made and fairly comfortable for a light duty winter boot. On the 9th day of 12hr plus work days the sole on the boot pulled off the toe area and down the side. I was under the impression that with the reputation for quality that carhartt has built that the soles would be stitched on and not glued. I would not recommend these boots to anyone that is tough on boots.
customer_reviews.author: Erika

customer_reviews.title: Very stiff, not wide enough
customer_reviews.text: Looks like a well built boot. I ordered a wide width... unfortunately not even close to a wide width of other boots. Poor arch supports and the leather after a week and a half of waring 10+ hours a day is still very stiff. Not sure I am going to ware them anymore.
customer_reviews.author: Curtis Baker

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable but not as warm as I needed. In hindsight I should have looked for a boot with more than 400g of insulation, but that's my fault.
customer_reviews.author: T.R.

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I like the boots! 3rd pair. 2nd pair on line I ordered. I work on a garbage route and drop box driver. Will continue to buy these boots!
customer_reviews.author: phylo

customer_reviews.title: Not what I was expecting.
customer_reviews.text: Thinsulate is too hot for summer. Boots feel like clown shoes. Tongue and ankle not very comfortable after 2 weeks. Tan comp toe version was my first pick but nobody has those in size 10M anywhere but I'm guessing they're the same as brown version. Going back to crappy tan survivors from wall Mart.
customer_reviews.author: SleepZombie

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I have foot problems, so I need the right boot. Ordered these a few months ago, they are what work boots should be, comfortable, good ankle and arch support, pretty tough. The reason I am writing a review is, the foundation was flooded on top of the concrete floor, I worked in 3" of water for almost 5 hours getting the deck on. When I took them off they were bone dry inside. Very impressed, I am ordering a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: Trapper

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot
customer_reviews.text: These boots lasted a little over a year. That is as expected for my use and abuse. Would buy again. They were comfortable from day one.
customer_reviews.author: BTJames

customer_reviews.title: Durable high quality waterproof
customer_reviews.text: 10 hours A-day 6 days a week and construction. I will never buy a different boot. I can say they are how little warm in the summer this is more of a colder weather boot, but it's not like wearing a snow boot. I just switch to thinner socks and it is just fine
customer_reviews.author: jason freitag

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Great boot. I wear a 10.5 wide sneaker so I ordered a size 11 wide boot. These boots felt great the first time I wore them. Felt like I was wearing them for weeks. I have been wearing them at work for about 2 months now and they are holding up great.
customer_reviews.author: Greg S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice boots
customer_reviews.text: Loves them a little time to work them in but he loves them. First time buying carhardt boots will buy again as they r holding us beautifully
customer_reviews.author: Kelley Jones

customer_reviews.title: These have to be one of the best if not the best pair of steel toe boots ...
customer_reviews.text: These have to be one of the best if not the best pair of steel toe boots I've ever owned. If you are on your feet twelve hours or more through the day as I am, they are a must have. Durable and comfortable. That's hard to find together in a work boot.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Pickering

customer_reviews.title: My husband swears by these boots. He wears them ...
customer_reviews.text: My husband swears by these boots. He wears them for work. He works construction and they last twice as long as any other boots he owns. The boot laces are very weak and don't last more than a week or 2 so we always have to replace them.
customer_reviews.author: Rjyoadnie

customer_reviews.title: So far so good
customer_reviews.text: Bought these boots for my husband who is in concrete commercial construction. They took a few days to break in. But they are comfortable, and work great in cooler weather. Hope they last a while as he is very hard on boots
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Beene

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the money
customer_reviews.text: I am not impressed, Carhartt has always had great products but they need to get out of shoe sales. You could get similar quality at Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: craig

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality leather.
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality leather. Cracked and broke in less than a year and now have holes on either sides of the boots. Right through all layers beneath as well. Not the longevity expected from a $150+ pair of "work" boots. Comfortable boots and soles wore well. But terrible quality leather.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great value good company 100%
customer_reviews.text: Best pair of work boots I have ever owned in 35,yrs. 100% worth the $$$$$$ for sure will buy again
customer_reviews.author: Peter Choiniere

customer_reviews.title: size and reliability
customer_reviews.text: Boots arrived by estimated time, were true to fit. I have only had these for a couple of weeks but they were waterproof the first time I went out through some high wet grass, although I added some mink oil to ensure waterproofness. I would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Robo3

customer_reviews.title: Take a beating for sure
customer_reviews.text: These boots lasted one year the last time I purchased them. Boots usually last me 3 to 4 months. I work multi trade. So concrete steel and heavy equipment work. Yeah these boots do last. My 3rd pair so far in three years.
customer_reviews.author: trixter

customer_reviews.title: Size
customer_reviews.text: I couldn’t get my foot in the boot only way I can see these fitting is if you have small or a woman.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: TERRIBLE
customer_reviews.text: Absolute trash, didn't even last 3 months! The toe is completely falling apart and no longer waterproof. SKIP THESE IF YOU WORK CONSTRUCTION
customer_reviews.author: clint k.

customer_reviews.title: Fair.
customer_reviews.text: Needs a gel insert for comfort but holding up well with all the oil and climbing I do daily. Wish they were stitched not glued. I always worry about separation of the soles and boot.
customer_reviews.author: Roxann Mitchell

customer_reviews.title: quality of sole to leather not well made!
customer_reviews.text: Used 6-12 hour work days in seasonal monsoon weather didn't hold up- side of soles came unglued
customer_reviews.author: rene c. buenabenta

customer_reviews.title: All day comfort, too cheap for carhartt
customer_reviews.text: All day comfort and actually water proof... for about 4-5 months... then began to leak, and toe started to deteriorate... not worth the price, not up to the brands reputation....
customer_reviews.author: TES

customer_reviews.title: Boot falls apart
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my husband as a Father's day gift, he wore these boots 5 times and the bottoms are peeling back, his last boots he had lasted him years. Very disappointed with this.
customer_reviews.author: Danniele Riley Robinson

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Would be better if they put a loop on the back to help get them on.
customer_reviews.author: Michael

customer_reviews.title: Meh
customer_reviews.text: There’s a pad along the heap kinda hurts but there boots
customer_reviews.author: Jimmy

customer_reviews.title: Good boots
customer_reviews.text: Good boots, same fit as my other boots from them, super warm on cold days
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Martin

customer_reviews.title: Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: These boots are terrible, not even remotely water proof. And they cause my feet to break out into a rash. Called carhartt and they couldn't really care less about the issue. I don't recommend that anyone buy these boots.
customer_reviews.author: sean

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable with extra room to grow exactly what I wanted
customer_reviews.author: John minott

customer_reviews.title: Your won’t be disappointment
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boot short time break in. Warm and dry working outside
customer_reviews.author: Glenn

customer_reviews.title: fantastic 10 stars
customer_reviews.text: great boots right out of the box. no break-in. size is spot on. would very much recommend. I work in manufacturing on concrete floors standing all day. these boots are like gloves for your feet. I am very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: rick hansen

customer_reviews.title: Not worth  the money!!
customer_reviews.text: This shoe is not for construction. The leather is so soft, it cut easily, nails, steel anything that touches it, slices it open!!! Not worth the money!! The toe guard, is useless, it is softer than the leather itself... Will not buy again!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfort and doesn't break the bank!
customer_reviews.text: My husband will only wear these now! Great price and comfortable boot!
customer_reviews.author: Danielle Boehnert

customer_reviews.title: Well made,waterproof and insulated!
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my husband, they fit very well and have kept his feet very dry and warm during the past two snow storms. (minus degree and wind chill)
customer_reviews.author: Larae

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: I love how well made this was but my bf said it made his feet sweat in the middle of winter. Otherwise was worth the price and recommend it to others.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Owens

customer_reviews.title: How well they were made and fit.
customer_reviews.text: These were a gift for my son for his Birthday and he’s very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good boot, hoping rub runs out
customer_reviews.text: 1 week in, still breakin in. The heel is pretty stuff, taking some rub even with mountaineering wool socks. Heavy but durable. So far so good, unless the heel rub doesn't go away...
customer_reviews.author: HotelBravo

customer_reviews.title: I have never been happier with an out of the box purchase of boots
customer_reviews.text: I have never been happier with an out of the box purchase of boots. Extremely good quality. As far as weight goes - they are a good weight, not overly heavy.
customer_reviews.author: My review

customer_reviews.title: These have been some of the best work boots I’ve owned
customer_reviews.text: This is the second pair of Carhartt Workboots that I’ve purchase. The first pair was for the winter. Man that’s a good boot all around
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Well built boot.
customer_reviews.text: It’s a well built boot. I like to spray a little water protectant on it every couple couples just to help them from getting wet. I’m inside and outside constantly all day long. They never get too hot or too cold. This is my second pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: Melz

customer_reviews.title: Overall pretty great
customer_reviews.text: Great boot! Of course it was a little uncomfortable at first, but got way better. Waterproofness works great. Only problem is it's not real good on ladders, if you work on them for long periods of time, but not terrible.
customer_reviews.author: Gus

customer_reviews.title: Love Carhartt products😎
customer_reviews.text: Bought the right kind of socks so my Ruggedflex fit perfect
customer_reviews.author: Steven VanBuskirk

customer_reviews.title: Best boot out there
customer_reviews.text: Best and most warm boot I've ever worn. Feet are never cold or wet. I work outside doing labor all day and its beensingle digit weather with ice snow and mud all around never had a problem once. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Ty McMillan

customer_reviews.title: If you can replace it please.
customer_reviews.text: I've wear it one time only, is too big to the point that it's hurting my feet.
customer_reviews.author: alkeyrou , issoufou

customer_reviews.title: So far a good boot
customer_reviews.text: Nice boots but even with double insoles, they are hard so I’m hoping for a lasting boot.
customer_reviews.author: Angel Pridgen-Mcgowan

customer_reviews.title: Not good quality
customer_reviews.text: Even though they look quite strong and beautiful outside, after a week of use in a wet environment the sole section starting coming out badly. I recommend to look for other options in the market.
customer_reviews.author: Deydi

customer_reviews.title: 4 months  poor quality
customer_reviews.text: Boot fit well but fell apart in less than 4 months. Great for a home owner but not so good for working class. They are very warm boots if you need for cold weather but they start to leak if not treated after about 1.5 weeks
customer_reviews.author: Marc

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boot! I am a construction superintendent and on ...
customer_reviews.text: Excellent boot! I am a construction superintendent and on my feet all day. It’s very comfortable and the 8” height gives excellent ankle support.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Kucera

customer_reviews.title: Buy them don’t hesitate
customer_reviews.text: I’m a person who buys based off reviews. I’m in construction and these boots are great. Nice and comfortable along with insulated to keep my feet warm. Will definitely buy again come time for new ones
customer_reviews.author: darrien lee

customer_reviews.title: Sole came off!
customer_reviews.text: I bought them in May and now the sole is coming off, very disappointing. I expected better out of these boots. I highly recommend ordering something else.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew

customer_reviews.title: Great work boots
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these for my husband. They came just in time. He had gotten a diesel fuel additive all over his other boots. They couldn't come in the house they smelled so bad. He loves his new boots.
customer_reviews.author: Bonita Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot for the price!
customer_reviews.text: These are a very good boot for the price. This is my second pair and I will continue to wear these.
customer_reviews.author: Casey

customer_reviews.title: Seems like good product but size runs a little smaller
customer_reviews.text: Seems like good product but I had to send them back to be able to get a half size bigger and wider.
customer_reviews.author: Israel Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: So far love these boots comfortable and less fatigue only had 3 weeks so far not even fully broken in but so far a overall great pair of work boots.
customer_reviews.author: James wright

customer_reviews.title: Lighter and warmer than steel toe boots.  Very comfortable right out of the box.
customer_reviews.text: A very well made boot. I work in the woods in rough terrain. Good stability and the soles provide good traction on very slippery slopes. This boot is made for the outdoors.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Damm good work boot
customer_reviews.text: Worth every penny I’ve been wearing them for about five months every day and they are some of the best work boots I’ve ever had, the break in period is only a few days then it’s smooth sailing from there.
customer_reviews.author: Austin Ralph Bodley

customer_reviews.title: Fits well and they actually last.
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable boots, mostly waterproof, the laces surprisingly haven't fallen apart on me yet. I've tried a few different Cats, wolverines, and even other carhartts, but these are my favorite by far.
customer_reviews.author: Luke

customer_reviews.title: its good.
customer_reviews.text: A bit big but with thick socks, its good. After 7hrs at work my left side of my toes hurt
customer_reviews.author: sonny

customer_reviews.title: Not bad
customer_reviews.text: Great product, didn't last as long as I expected but then wear I work I go through boots frequently.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Great product I absolutely love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Love these boots I’ve gone threw 3 other pairs of boots this year and these are by far my favorite and most comfortable!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Exactly as described. They fit well and keep my ...
customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. They fit well and keep my feet warm.
customer_reviews.author: DMP

customer_reviews.title: Wider than expected
customer_reviews.text: I like the style of the boot and have always purchased Carhartt boots and been pleased with the product. I’m unhappy with the width of this and plan on returning them.
customer_reviews.author: Dale thompson

customer_reviews.title: Excellent quality.
customer_reviews.text: I work in construction so its important that my feet are comfortable and warm throughout the day. These boots are great.
customer_reviews.author: P. O'BRIEN

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great boot. Used them outside in the U.P. to shovel snow, very warm and waterproof.
customer_reviews.author: chris whipple

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Best boots I have had in 10 years. Waterproof, lightweight they keep my weak ankle supported.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Love these boots
customer_reviews.text: Just what the photo and description said. They fit good and are an all around good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Lance kimball

customer_reviews.title: Really nice boots
customer_reviews.text: My husband really likes these boots...never bought Carhartt before but he is very happy with them...keeps his feet warm & dry.We will buy these boots again...thanks Carhartt ! bought a 10 W and they fit perfect for his wide feet
customer_reviews.author: JoAnne I

customer_reviews.title: Great boots so far
customer_reviews.text: The fit is good. Haven't had any trouble in the few weeks I've had them. Hoping to get at least a year out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Ministryman

customer_reviews.title: Runs large. I order size down
customer_reviews.text: Ordering a size down I’m still able to wear heavy wool socks with great comfort: for a steel toe booty.
customer_reviews.author: Kr8zydawg

customer_reviews.title: Great Boot.
customer_reviews.text: I'm very happy with these boots. For me. They fit great. Very comfortable. I'll definitely buy them again.
customer_reviews.author: Bruce McGowan

product_meta.title: Carhartt Men's Ruggedflex Safety Toe Work Boot
product_meta.description: The Rugged Flex name describes this tough Carhartt work boot perfectly. Rugged durability engineered with materials and components to work as hard as you do. The 8" height, Oil Tanned Leather, Storm Defender waterproof membrane and 400g 3M Thinsulate insulation all work together to keep you safe and dry. Cement constructed with Carhartt rubber Rugged Flex outsole and five layers of cushion keep you comfortable all day. Composite safety toe is ASTM 2413-11 EH Rated.
